summary: REQ-4 appears implemented by adding a Home item to the mobile bottom navigation with active-route styling. REQ-5 adds a visible checkbox and touch swipe gesture on goal cards to toggle completion with error toasts; however, the diff shows the toggle uses new dedicated completion endpoints rather than the existing update mutation as specified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Toggling completion from the goals list should update the goal via the existing update mutation (updateGoal) and then refresh/reflect updated status.
missing_requirements.reason: The new completion toggle hook calls actor.setGoalCompleted / actor.setGoalNotCompleted rather than using the existing updateGoal mutation path, so the requirement to use the existing update mutation is not met based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a new completion-toggle API path (actor.setGoalCompleted / actor.setGoalNotCompleted) instead of using the existing updateGoal mutation.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest requires using the existing update mutation for completion toggling; adding and relying on separate completion endpoints is not requested.
